name: X0 Skeletons
description:
The year's twenty-twenty-something, and there's trouble under the city. 

In the sewers, abandoned buildings and railway tunnels, creatures have been spawning. The government's solution? Conscript teenagers in mechs to fight the menace back... and give them a support worker to listen to their whingeing. 

Join Sofia as she supports her cohort of monster-fighting teens, and starts to have her own suspicions about what's going on underground. 

This is an incomplete game jam version,  created by tentaclerental for Team Yellow Dinosaur's Mecha Game Jam 2019. 

@tentaclerental, twitter & instagram.
